subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers are 5-0 in Game 7s since 2011-12, but Derek Stepan summed up the mood in the locker room when he said, “I don’t think anyone in here is comfortable.”
snippet: The Rangers are 5-0 in Game 7s since 2011-12, but Derek Stepan summed up the mood in the locker room when he said, “I don’t think anyone in here is comfortable.”
